Institution: FSCJ - FLORIDA STATE COLLEGE AT JAX.
Course Description: THIS COURSE IS AN INTRODUCTION TO MANAGERIAL ACCOUNTING. IT WILL FOCUS ON THREE MAJOR AREAS:  (1) PLANNING AND CONTROLLING ROUTINE OPERATIONS (BREAK-EVEN ANALYSIS, JOB ORDER AND PROCESS COST SYSTEMS), (2) INVENTORY VALUATION AND INCOME DETERMINATION (BUDGETING AND STANDARD COSTING) AND (3) POLICY MAKING AND LONG-RANGE PLANNING (CAPITAL BUDGETING).
